original_text: Jeroboam also built places on hills for people to worship. He chose men who were not from Levi's tribe to be priests.
korean_text: 그가 또 산당들을 짓고 레위 자손 아닌 보통 백성으로 제사장을 삼고

sentences.original_text: Jeroboam also built places on hills
He chose men who were not from Levi's tribe
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 레위 지파에서 온 사람이 아닌 남자들을 선택했습니다
